import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin return (
EShop
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ): ( Login )}
) } export default Header
